DOC.brief_summary: Randomized clinical trial , conduct Intensive Care Unit Hospital de Clinicas de Porto Alegre october 2011 november 2015 .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Three Technical Airway Clearance Mechanical Ventilated Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To compare effectiveness technique : vibrocompression ( G1 ) , hyperinflation mechanical ventilation ( G2 ) vibrocompression + hyperinflation mechanical ventilation ( G3 ) amount aspirate secretion , mechanical ventilator time , incidence ventilator-associated pneumonia , reintubation tracheal mortality mechanical ventilator . Primary outcome : weight gram aspirate secretion . Secondary outcome : hemodynamic pulmonary parameter : heart rate , respiratory rate , mean arterial pressure , peripheral arterial oxygen saturation ; peak inspiratory pressure , tidal volume ; dynamic compliance ; mechanical ventilator time ; reintubation tracheal ; Incidence ventilator-associated pneumonia mortality mechanical ventilator .
DOC.criteria: In mechanical ventilation period 2472 h Endexpiratory pressure ( PEEP ) low 10 cm water . Lower noradrenaline dose 0.5mg / kg / minute average great equal blood outstrips 60 mmHg . Pneumothorax hemothorax undrained Subcutaneous emphysema Osteoporosis Acute respiratory distress syndrome ( ARDS ) Fractures rib Obese ( BMI great 35 ) Mechanical ventilator high peak pressure 40 cm water .
